alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North Cass; North Itasca; South Cass; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 15 at 3:08PM CDT until March 17 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THURSDAY TO 7 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph causing blowing and drifting of the snow. * WHERE...Koochiching, North Itasca, North Cass, South Itasca and South Cass Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bois Forte Band, Nett Lake and, Deer Creek areas. * WHEN...From 10 AM Thursday to 7 AM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Koochiching; North Cass; North Itasca; South Cass; South Itasca
